summary: Educational website about Renewable Energy with 8 main sections covering renewable energy overview, solar heating systems, solar cells/photovoltaic cells, hydropower, wind power, geothermal energy, biomass, and biofuels. Modern responsive design with eco-friendly colors, smooth animations, sticky navigation, dark mode toggle, interactive features including quiz, FAQ, contact form, and downloadable PDF summary. Target audience: high school/college level.
architectural_notes: Multi-page educational website structure with 8 main content sections plus FAQ and contact pages
HTML5 semantic structure with CSS styling and JavaScript for interactivity
Responsive breakpoints for mobile, tablet, and desktop views
Dark mode implementation with toggle switch
Animated elements: statistics counters, rotating turbine graphic, smooth scrolling, hover effects

existing_features.title: Create a responsive layout with sticky navigation bar containing links to all 8 main sections (Renewable Energy Overview, Solar Heating Systems, Solar Cells, Hydropower, Wind Power, Geothermal Energy, Biomass, Biofuels), smooth scrolling between sections, and a footer with quick links, social media icons, newsletter subscription form, and references section
Implement eco-friendly color theme using greens, blues, and earth tones throughout the design with hover effects, subtle animations, and modern typography

Build Renewable Energy Overview page with definition of renewable energy, importance for climate change, comparison table between renewable and fossil fuels, environmental/economic/social benefits sections, global perspective mentioning International Renewable Energy Agency and United Nations, and future of renewable energy section
Add infographic showing renewable vs non-renewable energy sources and animated statistics counters section to the Overview page

Create Solar Heating Systems page explaining what solar heating systems are, how solar thermal collectors work, active vs passive solar heating, residential and commercial applications, advantages and limitations, and real-world implementation examples with a diagram of a solar heating system and step-by-step heat transfer process explanation

Build Solar Cells/Photovoltaic page explaining what photovoltaic cells are, how the photovoltaic effect works, key materials like silicon, grid-connected vs off-grid systems, efficiency factors, battery storage, with mentions of Albert Einstein's photoelectric effect contribution and Tesla's solar/battery innovation, including an animated diagram of sunlight converting to electricity and comparison chart of solar panel types

Create Hydropower page explaining how hydropower plants generate electricity, dams vs run-of-river systems, turbines and generators, environmental impacts (positive and negative), mentioning Three Gorges Dam as an example, with a diagram of a hydropower plant and pros/cons table

Build Wind Power page explaining how wind turbines work, onshore vs offshore wind farms, wind turbine components, energy output factors, mentioning Denmark as a wind energy leader, with an animated rotating turbine graphic and map showing major wind-producing regions

Create Geothermal Energy page explaining what geothermal energy is, how geothermal power plants operate, direct use vs electricity generation, geothermal heat pumps, mentioning Iceland as a major geothermal energy user, with underground heat diagram and environmental benefits section

Build Biomass page explaining what biomass energy is, sources (wood, waste, crops), how biomass is converted into energy, carbon cycle explanation, advantages and concerns including deforestation and emissions, with visual carbon cycle diagram and comparison with fossil fuels

Create Biofuels page explaining what biofuels are, types (biodiesel, ethanol, biogas), how biofuels are produced, use in transportation, pros and cons, mentioning Brazil as a major ethanol producer, with flowchart of biofuel production and transportation application examples
Implement dark mode toggle that switches between light and dark themes across all pages
Build interactive FAQ section with collapsible questions and answers about renewable energy topics
Create contact form page with input fields for name, email, subject, and message
Add interactive quiz about renewable energy with multiple-choice questions covering topics from all 8 sections, score tracking, and results display
Implement downloadable PDF summary feature that generates a comprehensive summary of renewable energy content from the website
Add 'Did You Know?' fact boxes throughout the content pages with interesting renewable energy facts
Embed educational videos about renewable energy topics throughout relevant sections
Ensure semantic HTML5 structure with proper heading hierarchy (H1, H2, H3), SEO optimization with meta tags, and full accessibility compliance including ARIA labels and alt text for all images
Apply educational, inspiring, and future-focused tone throughout all written content on the website
Remove all 'Learn More' sections that contain VideoEmbed components from the Overview page
Remove all 'Learn More' sections that contain VideoEmbed components from the Solar Heating Systems page
Remove all 'Learn More' sections that contain VideoEmbed components from the Solar Cells/Photovoltaic page
Remove all 'Learn More' sections that contain VideoEmbed components from the Hydropower page
Remove all 'Learn More' sections that contain VideoEmbed components from the Wind Power page
Remove all 'Learn More' sections that contain VideoEmbed components from the Geothermal Energy page
Remove all 'Learn More' sections that contain VideoEmbed components from the Biomass page

Solar Heating Systems page with explanation, active vs passive heating, applications, diagram, and step-by-step heat transfer process
Solar Cells/Photovoltaic page with photovoltaic effect explanation, animated diagram, comparison chart, mentions of Einstein and Tesla
Hydropower page with plant diagrams, dams vs run-of-river systems, pros/cons table, Three Gorges Dam example
Wind Power page with turbine explanation, animated rotating graphic, major wind regions map, Denmark example
Geothermal Energy page with underground heat diagram, Iceland example, direct use vs electricity generation
Biomass page with carbon cycle diagram, sources explanation, comparison with fossil fuels
Biofuels page with production flowchart, types (biodiesel, ethanol, biogas), Brazil example
Responsive design with sticky navigation, smooth scrolling, hover effects, eco-friendly color theme (greens, blues, earth tones)
Footer with quick links, social media icons, newsletter subscription, and references section
"Did You Know?" fact boxes throughout content
SEO optimization with proper heading structure and accessibility compliance (ARIA labels, alt text)
Remove all 'Learn More' sections that contain VideoEmbed components from the Biofuels page
